urls.title: Precious chalk stream in Bexley gets health boost - Thames21
urls.description: Bexley residents and local wildlife can now enjoy a healthier river Cray where it flows through Foots Cray Meadows, Bexley.Waterways charity Thames21 has carried out restoration work on an 800m stretch of the river

text:
#DYK there are only 200 chalk streams in the world?! The river Cray, #Bexley, is an urban chalk stream which faces pressures including litter, plastic pollution & toxic chemicals from roads. Read about how we're rewilding it here: https://t.co/x04GRodbUL

Both are untrue in general - farming was far less regulated in the 70s & 80s, & WQ worse.
